meanings.definition: Expressing a doubt or choice between alternatives.
meanings.sent1: I am unsure whether to wear the red shirt or the blue shirt.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't decide whether to have pizza or pasta for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked unsure whether to jump on the couch or the bed.
meanings.sent4: The fog made it difficult to see whether the figure in the distance was a person or a tree.
meanings.sent5: The detective pondered whether the suspect was telling the truth or lying.

meanings.definition: Introducing a direct question or indirect question.
meanings.sent1: I wonder whether you will come to the party.
meanings.sent2: He asked whether she had seen his missing keys.
meanings.sent3: The teacher inquired whether the students had completed their homework.
meanings.sent4: She pondered whether it was worth going out in the rain.
meanings.sent5: The child asked whether they could have ice cream for dessert.
